snippet: Fowler’s once-promising season has become a nightmare, capped by a disappointing finish at the Barclays on Sunday, but as the defending Deutsche Bank champion, he is confident....
lead_paragraph: Fowler’s once-promising season has become a nightmare, capped by a disappointing finish at the Barclays on Sunday, but as the defending Deutsche Bank champion, he is confident.
abstract: Rickie Fowler is optimistic about his chances at upcoming Deutsche Bank Championship golf tournament, despite his lackluster performance in 2016; remains in running to secure spot for Ryder Cup team.

headline.main: As Deutsche Bank Looms, Rickie Fowler Recalls Good Old Days of Last Year
headline.print_headline: Amid Disappointing Season, Fowler Recalls the Good Old Days, of Last Year
